name: Agent P
description:
Agent P is ready. The mission is simple! Plant a bug at the local plant and make it out alive! 

Controls:

  • Movement: arrow keys
  • Shoot: Space
  • Reload: R

The game has been created for the GBJAM10 with the theme: Plant/Plants. 

Restrictions:

  • 160x144px 
  • 4 colors
  • D-pad (arrow keys), a (space), b (R)
  • All assets made during the duration of the jam
